response.original_title: Rainer Hersch April Fool's Day Concert
response.overview: Whether you are a music professor or couldn't tell a string quartet from a string vest, this is the concert you have been waiting for. At a sold-out Royal Festive Hall, Rainer Hersch "the worl'ds first classical music hooligan" (The Sun) brings together stars of music and comedy to produce an evening of inspired humour and musical mayhem. A guaranteed laugh every four bars.
response.title: Rainer Hersch April Fool's Day Concert
